segments.text: I've seen this kind of domestic blindness before, and it always irks me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly disengaged from their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is literally pouring all over the floor, a complete waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She acts as if nothing unusual is happening, just drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, those children are clearly up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They know exactly what they're doing, taking those cookies secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically asking for an accident on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic setup for disaster, preventable and frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself annoyed by the sheer incompetence on display here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a certain kind of person who just floats through life oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The serene garden outside only amplifies the irritation I feel for the indoor chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to get a grip on this household.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frankly quite irritating to witness such a lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR
